abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Telecommunications
            Technical Assistance Project are: (a) to assist the
            Secretariate of Communications and Transport (SCT) to
            strengthen its capability to regulate telecommunication
            services and networks; (b) to assist the SCT to modernize
            and improve its management and monitoring of the radio
            spectrum; and (c) to assist Telecommunications of Mexico
            (TELECOMM) to develop its business activities.  The project
            consists of three components: (a) regulation of services and
            networks which will be undertaken in 3 stages; (b)
            regulation of the radio spectrum which will be undertaken in
            2 stages; (c) a TELECOMM business development component
            which will plan the expansion and modernization of
            TELECOMM's satellite system, assess the market
            potential of new services and explore opportunities for
            joint ventures.
